text: Haroina, Mo in kitoʙi Qur'onro ʙa haq ʙaroi hidojati mardum ʙar tu nozil kardem. Pas, har kas, ki ʙa ravsanii on hidojat joft, va ʙa on amal kard ʙa naf'i xudi ust va har ki ʙa on amal nakard va az rohi haq gumroh sud, alʙatta, ʙa zarari xud ʙa gumrohi aftodaast va tu ej Rasul, vakili a'moli onho nesti, to amalhojasonro muhofizat namoi va ʙar on ci ki mexohi macʙur sozi, ʙalki vazifai tu tanho rasondani haq ast
